pageContext.claim: “Well, we have a IGs in from the Obama era. And as you know, it's a presidential decision. And I left them, largely. I may change some, but I left them.”
pageContext.analysis: President Trump removed five of the 74 inspectors general serving in the government in six weeks. While many were left in place, Trump removed those who are critical of his or his administration’s actions. Several served presidents of both parties.
